sense.gloss: to go to bed, to lie in bed
to sleep (with someone, i.e. have intercourse)
to lie idle (of funds, stock, etc.)
to ferment (of soy sauce, miso, etc.)
(afternoon) nap, sleeping during the day, siesta
going to bed, retiring (for the night)
turning over in bed, rolling over, tossing and turning
bed, berth, crib, cot, kip, bedroom
giving up in frustration, accepting meekly, being compelled to accept a situation
to put to bed, to let sleep
to lay (something) down, to put on its side
to let (money, goods, etc.) lie idle, to set aside unused, to let (stock) lie unsold
to (let) ferment, to (let) age, to let (dough) rise, to lay down (wine)
bed and food, eating and sleeping
to be confined to one's bed, to be laid up
sleeping late in the morning, sleeping in, lie-in, oversleeping
late riser, person who is bad at getting up in the morning
to put to bed, to let sleep
to lay (something) down, to put on its side
to let (money, goods, etc.) lie idle, to set aside unused, to let (stock) lie unsold
to (let) ferment, to (let) age, to let (dough) rise, to lay down (wine)
to sprawl, to lie sprawled, to stretch oneself out, to lie relaxed on one's side
nightclothes, nightwear, sleepwear, pyjamas, pajamas, nightgown, nightdress
to lie down, to go to bed, to go to sleep
being still half asleep, being half awake, being not yet quite awake

x: 寝小便・ねしょうべん

sense.gloss: good things come to those who wait
removal of make-up before going to sleep
to miss a chance to sleep, to be wakeful

sdata.j: そろそろ↑寝↑↓ね↓なくちゃ。
sdata.e: I have to go to sleep.

sdata.j: すぐに↑諦↑↓あきら↓めて↑昼寝↑↓ひるね↓をするかも↑知↑↓し↓れない。
sdata.e: I may give up soon and just nap instead.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑寝↑↓ね↓なければなりません。
sdata.e: I have to go to bed.

sdata.j: もう↑寝↑↓ね↓なくちゃ。
sdata.e: I have to go to bed.

sdata.j: ↑寝↑↓ね↓ないと！
sdata.e: I have to go to bed.

sdata.j: ↑寝↑↓ね↓ようと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think I'm gonna go to sleep.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑寝↑↓ね↓たふりをしているからいびきをかいていないんだ。
sdata.e: She's faking sleep. That's why she's not snoring.

sdata.j: 「もし↑疲↑↓つか↓れているなら↑寝↑↓ね↓たらどう？」「↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑今↑↓いま↓↑寝↑↓ね↓たらあまりに↑早↑↓はや↓く↑目覚↑↓めざ↓めてしまうから」
sdata.e: If you're tired, why don't you go to sleep? "Because if I go to sleep now I will wake up too early."

sdata.j: ↑寝↑↓ね↓てるな、↑寝↑↓ね↓ながらお↑金↑↓かね↓を↑稼↑↓かせ↓げるなら↑別↑↓べつ↓だが。
sdata.e: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑朝寝坊↑↓あさねぼう↓に↑違↑↓ちが↓いない。
sdata.e: You must be a late riser.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑寝↑↓ね↓ていたほうがよさそうだ。
sdata.e: It would be better for you to stay in bed today.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いからすぐ↑寝↑↓ね↓たほうがいい。
sdata.e: You look pale. You had better lie down in bed at once.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑寝↑↓ね↓なければならない。
sdata.e: You must go to bed now.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑寝↑↓ね↓たほうがいい。
sdata.e: You had better go to bed now.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はすぐ↑寝↑↓ね↓たほうがよい。
sdata.e: You may as well go to bed at once.

sdata.j: いつも↑何↑↓なん↓↑時↑↓じ↓↑頃↑↓ごろ↓に↑寝↑↓ね↓るの？
sdata.e: What time do you usually go to bed?

sdata.j: あなたはいつもは↑何時↑↓いつ↓に↑寝↑↓ね↓ますか。
sdata.e: What time do you usually go to bed?

sdata.j: あなたは↑普段↑↓ふだん↓↑何↑↓なん↓↑時↑↓じ↓に↑寝↑↓ね↓ますか。
sdata.e: What time do you usually go to bed?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑寝床↑↓ねどこ↓の↑敷↑↓じ↓き↑方↑↓かた↓↑通↑↓どお↓りに、↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑寝↑↓ね↓なくてはならない。
sdata.e: As you make your bed, you must lie on it.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のベッドのつくり↑方↑↓かた↓に↑応↑↓おう↓じて↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑寝↑↓ね↓なければならない。
sdata.e: As you make your bed, so you must lie in it.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑寝室↑↓しんしつ↓を↑共用↑↓きょうよう↓していた↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓はどうなったのだろう。
sdata.e: What happened to the girl you were sharing the bedroom with?

sdata.j: ↑熊↑↓くま↓はまた、２４↑時間↑↓じかん↓↑明↑↓あか↓るい↑夏↑↓なつ↓は↑当↑↓あ↓てはまらないが、↑夜↑↓よる↓よりも↑昼↑↓ひる↓に↑寝↑↓ね↓る↑傾向↑↓けいこう↓がある。↑夜↑↓よる↓↑活動↑↓かつどう↓するのはアザラシの↑行動↑↓こうどう↓と↑関係↑↓かんけい↓があるだろう。
sdata.e: Bears also tend to sleep more during the day than at night, although in the summer, with twenty-four hours of light, this does not apply.

sdata.j: ↑興奮↑↓こうふん↓していたので、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑寝付↑↓ねつ↓かれなかった。
sdata.e: I was so excited that I could not fall asleep.

sdata.j: ↑教授↑↓きょうじゅ↓のだるい↑講演↑↓こうえん↓で↑寝↑↓ね↓てしまった。
sdata.e: The professor's boring lecture put me to sleep.

sdata.j: ↑泣↑↓な↓き↑寝入↑↓ねい↓りなんて↑嫌↑↓いや↓だ。
sdata.e: I can't let the matter drop.

sdata.j: ↑泣↑↓な↓き↑寝入↑↓ねい↓りするよりほか↑仕方↑↓しかた↓がない。
sdata.e: We just have to swallow it.

sdata.j: ↑気分↑↓きぶん↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓く、↑疲↑↓つか↓れていたので、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑早↑↓はや↓めに↑就寝↑↓しゅうしん↓した。
sdata.e: Sick and tired, she went to bed early.

sdata.j: ↑気↑↓き↓が↑付↑↓つ↓いてみると↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑寝室↑↓しんしつ↓に↑寝↑↓ね↓ていた。
sdata.e: I found myself lying in my bedroom.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑帰↑↓かえ↓りの↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓で↑寝過↑↓ねす↓ごしてしまった。
sdata.e: On my way home, I fell asleep on the train and rode past my station.

sdata.j: ↑帰↑↓かえ↓ってきた↑時↑↓とき↓、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑娘↑↓むすめ↓が↑寝↑↓ね↓ているのを↑知↑↓し↓った。
sdata.e: On his return he found her daughter asleep.
